Header: Central Troops Continue to Extinguish Bush Fires
Content: 18 Battalion Gemunu Watch (GW) troops of the 121 Brigade of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) doused a bush fire that erupted in Suduwathura Kanda in Okkampitiya Divisional Secretariat area in Moneragala District on Friday (9). For this operation, one Officer and twenty-five Other Ranks attended under the supervision and direction of Major General Rukmal Dias, Commander, Security Forces - Central. Meanwhile, another wildfire that occurred in Seelawatta area of Haldummulla Divisional Secretariat was quickly extinguished by Security Forces - Central troops on Saturday (11). The sudden fire was brought under control by a total 26 Army personnel of the SFHQ-Central.
